name: Aesthetic Roblox 1
description:
I will admit I took the sky theme by Elixeria and edited the code. I might make more, still trying to figure out how to change other aspects like the notification color, chat box functions etc.  

-> Also sorry for picture quality, it's high definition on my computer (display 1680 x 1050) 
     lol stylish wouldnt let me put a photo thats 800 kb
additional_info: Probably won't be changing this. Made 3/14/18. Does not change the login screen but should change the games interface, your home etc.

discussions.name: I like its background its so cute!
